mapper.insert: insert into carinfo (ID, type, color, seat, gas, rent, user_id, outdate, adddate) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gas,jdbcType=REAL}, #{rent,jdbcType=REAL}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update carinfo set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seat = #{seat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gas = #{gas,jdbcType=REAL}, rent = #{rent,jdbcType=REAL}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outdate = #{outdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adddate = #{adddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, type, color, seat, gas, rent, user_id, outdate, adddate from carinfo
